TextBlock.Text: NAME: Why is there an empty warp transmitter here?
NAME2: This warp transmitter used to lead to <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>, the invisible star orbiting <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
NAME2: <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>'s orbit is marked by the purple energy ring around <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
NAME2: The warp core from this transmitter was repurposed to power <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>'s warp core.
